div.p: The Argonaut DiagnosticReport Type Value Set is a 'starter set' of categories supported for fetching and Diagnostic Reports and notes.

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
CodeDisplay
LP29684-5Radiology
LP29708-2Cardiology
LP7839-6Pathology
